import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import lottie from'lottie-web';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AnimatedSticker(){const containerRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{let animation=null;if(containerRef.current){// Используем простую анимацию
const animationData={v:"5.7.4",fr:60,ip:0,op:180,w:200,h:200,nm:"Simple Animation",ddd:0,assets:[],layers:[{ddd:0,ind:1,ty:4,nm:"Circle",sr:1,ks:{o:{a:0,k:100},r:{a:1,k:[{t:0,s:[0],h:1},{t:90,s:[360],h:1}]},p:{a:0,k:[100,100]},s:{a:0,k:[100,100]}},shapes:[{ty:"el",p:{a:0,k:[0,0]},s:{a:0,k:[80,80]},d:1},{ty:"fl",c:{a:0,k:[0.2,0.4,1,1]},o:{a:0,k:100}}]}]};animation=lottie.loadAnimation({container:containerRef.current,renderer:'svg',loop:true,autoplay:true,animationData});}return()=>{if(animation){animation.destroy();}};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:containerRef,style:{width:'200px',height:'200px',margin:'0 auto'}});}export default AnimatedSticker;
